name: sns-emitter
description: Small library to emit SNS offline event
author: Tiago Guatierri <tiagovit@gmail.com

scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Bump package version to $npm_package_version" package.json; git flow release start $npm_package_version; git flow release finish -m $npm_package_version $npm_package_version; git checkout develop; git merge main
